ygData.subject: Re: My Main concern
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My favorite is when they try to run and just stop, not even attacking. I cackle maniacly and whack them in the back... then someone roots it, and it turns
ygData.messageBody:
Leif Smart wrote:

> - We can make it stack with the other spells such as snare and root. I don;t
> mind this one either but I can't see this one being impolemented.
>

My favorite is when they try to run and just stop, not even attacking.
I cackle maniacly and whack them in the back... then someone roots
it, and it turns around and hits me back while I finish him... ugh.

I don't understand how Verant has come up with their this spell
overrides
that one tables. IMO, it should be first on stays. Then at least I
know whether or not to bother casting.

Darkness is my most used spell, I want it back the way it was before
the "spell did not hold" patch. Or did it always get cancelled
and just give no message?

Xilith T'Vyn
